text: musage janaya ohugen pasu va ovunge abharana tulin vasu pætavakuge hædayen yut yamak (namadinnata) gatteya. eyata gava handakut viya. sæbævinma eya ovun samanga kata nokarana bavat ovunata eya rju manga nopenvana bavat ovuhu nodutuvo da? ovuhu eya (deviyan lesa) gattoya. tavada ovun aparadhakaruvan bavata pat vuha
